347: In your role, you will be responsible for the following key activities: Create accurate presentation drawings and highly detailed design elevations Document specifications and finish schedules for residential cabinetry projects. Prepare projects for engineering, CNC-based production, and procurement. Responsibilities Create accurate presentation drawings and highly detailed design elevations Document specifications and finish schedules for residential cabinetry projects Prepare projects for engineering, CNC-based production, and procurement Job Requirements Extensive experience with Cabinet Vision Knowledge of cabinetry, millwork, kitchen, and bath design Highly proficient with computers and fluent in MS Office and Adobe Acrobat A High School diploma is required. An Associates Degree in Drafting/CAD is highly desirable, but not required Willingness to learn and adapt to changes in fast-paced environment A great attitude, strong work ethic, and the ability to work as part of a team with little oversight and direction needed Self-motivated, detailed-oriented, and works well under pressure and tight deadlines Job Types: Full-time, Contract Pay: $500.00 - $1,000.00 per week Schedule: 8 hour shift Ability to commute/relocate: Pompano Beach, FL 33060: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required) Work Location: In person
